channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2023-0063|2024-08-02T04:54:32.710Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20shortcodes
item.description: The WordPress Shortcodes WordPress plugin through 1.6.36 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
